comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Hey, she makes nine cents an hour -- she has no right to complain . . . .

comment.author: 61849735@N00
comment._content: That crib looks like the one I had, I was born in the late '40's.  Sure wouldn't pass all the safety regs today.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: I was thinking the same thing. Mine was like that, but with wooden slats. Banned as a choking hazard nowadays -- some kids stuck their heads through the prison bars, but couldn't pull them out again.
